/*! ========================================================= * Argon Dashboard React - v1.2.2 ========================================================= * Product Page: https://www.creative-tim.com/product/argon-dashboard-react * Copyright 2022 Creative Tim (https://www.creative-tim.com) * Licensed under MIT (https://github.com/creativetimofficial/argon-dashboard-react/blob/master/LICENSE.md) * Coded by Creative Tim ========================================================= * The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software. */ // reactstrap components import Chart from "chart.js"; // react plugin used to create charts import { React, useRef, useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Badge, Card, CardHeader, Col, DropdownMenu, DropdownItem, UncontrolledDropdown, DropdownToggle, NavItem, NavLink, Nav, Progress, Container, Row, CardBody, Button, } from "reactstrap"; import { chartOptions, parseOptions } from "variables/charts.js"; // core components import Header from "components/Headers/Header.js"; const SSh = () => { const [value, setValue] = useState("CSD 0"); const [buttonColors, setButtonColors] = useState([ "success", "success", "success", "success", "success", "success", "success", "success", ]); const setButtonColor = (buttonName) => { const index = parseInt(buttonName.split(" ")[1]) - 1; // 버튼 이름에서 index 추출 return buttonColors[index]; }; const toggleButtonColor = (buttonName) => { const index = parseInt(buttonName.split(" ")[1]) - 1; // 버튼 이름에서 index 추출 const newButtonColors = [...buttonColors]; newButtonColors[index] = buttonColors[index] === "success" ? "danger" : "success"; setButtonColors(newButtonColors); }; const handleButtonClick = (e) => { const { value: buttonName } = e.target; setValue(buttonName); toggleButtonColor(buttonName); }; if (window.Chart) { parseOptions(Chart, chartOptions()); } return ( <>
{/* Page content */}

CSD Information
Select Server   {Array.from({ length: 8 }, (_, i) => i).map((index) => ( {`Server 10.0.0.10${index}`} ))}
{Array.from({ length: 8 }, (_, i) => i + 1).map((index) => ( ))}

SSH Connection

Selected CSD

{value}
Full Recover
Recover
78%
); }; export default SSh;
